attributes.action: Give paid leave to employees to house train a new puppy.
attributes.background: Providing sufficient training for a new puppy is critical for having a balanced and social new addition to the family. Giving the owner time during the initial period of adoption will allow them to have less difficulties when they are in work. This provides more stability to the animal and the owner

rejection.details: This petition seems to be calling on employers, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
